brief: This command deletes a DHCPv6 option from an address pool from the configuration database.
cmd-comment: This command includes two lists with exactly one address pool specification and exactly one option specification, comprising an option name, code, and as of Kea 3.1.1, an optional client-classes parameter (see :ref:`cb-cmds-option-class-tags-as-keys`). Specifying an empty list, a value of ``null``, or a server tag will result in an error.
cmd-syntax: <specification of the database to connect to>
name: remote-option6-pool-del
